name: 嚴建隆
objective:
「機電整合」是科際整合的實務技術，強調機械、電機、電子及電腦軟硬體之間，如何結合以機器的運轉，超越原來的極限，得到最佳效果。
"Mechatronic Integration" is a practical technology of interdisciplinary integration, emphasizing how to combine machinery, electrical machinery, electronics, and computer software and hardware to achieve the best results by combining the operation of the machine, beyond the original limit.
